Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Everything is going well in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'I remember hearing good things about the Gray Ravens, but they are far kinder than I imagined.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'There are quite a lot of differences between their behavior and those on the Engine, but I will adapt.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Your Grace... No, I should cross that out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Jamilah, I still don't quite understand why you dispatched me to Babylonia...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I know I'm an envoy, but I'm not skilled in diplomacy. I didn't even learn to read and write until I became a bodyguard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Not to mention... I... feel like I have more and more classes to make up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Sometimes, I even feel like it was a mistake to send me to Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...No, I can't say that. I'll cross it out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...But royal bodyguards never ask questions. We just carry out orders.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So, everything is going well here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'How are things on the Engine? Is everything okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Your Gr... Your last letter said that the anti-royalists were captured. So, the unrest on the Engine must have been solved.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "Now, it's time to start the long process of reform according to your vision."}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Once reformed, the Engine will finally be what you envisioned.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "I'll return and see it for myself when the first helium-3 transport craft leaves."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "As for the question you mentioned in the last letter, I... I don't know how to answer you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But the Gray Raven Commandant said that "I don\'t know" was also an answer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So, my answer is: "Current me doesn\'t know how to answer."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Strange... Past me wouldn\'t have hesitated to say "execute"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "After all, they're my lead... Jamilah's enemy. Enemies must be destroyed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'But I thought about what you said to me before I left...'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: '"I hope what comes back is no longer my sword or my doll, but a girl who sees the world for what it truly is."'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "I... still don't know what you mean. You have given me life and hope. I only wish to be your sword."}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'If you have time, please write back and tell me the exact reason for sending me here.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...It still looks a little strange.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But if I scratch out any more... I'll rip the paper.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Huh? Who knocks at a time like this...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Good evening.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...President!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Outside of working hours, just call me Mr. Hassen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '—Even though I came to speak with you about work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'You mean... My transfer request?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Correct. You've applied to be transferred out of the Gray Ravens to a new squad. I came to hear why.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I... can't keep up with them in battle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Is that so? I asked Liv for the log of your last mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Based on the battle log, it's hard to say who couldn't keep up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Regardless, that's not important now. Where do you want to be transferred?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...I'd like to be transferred to Cerberus if possible.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I see. A knife belongs with other knives. Is that it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...Correct. I don't think I'm suitable for the Gray Ravens.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But since Jamilah sent you here... Do you think she really wants you to be like a dagger?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I've got bad news, though. I don't know which filing cabinet Celica stuffed your transfer request in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Celica may need a few days before she can process it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'm going to get going.", 4: '1'}
